title: My account got broken into...
body:
On Tuesday the 14th, my account got broken into by someone. They played 3 games, 2 of which were ranked.
http://imgur.com/a/7oxZx (the 2 morde games and the rek sai leave) 
I often look at my match history, and I know I never use mordekaiser ranked, and I don't own Rek'sai
So even if I forgot playing those games it was just not me
I decided to check all of my account to see if he/she did any other things...
I notice I have 50 RP instead of 55...
So look at my purchase history...
http://imgur.com/a/%%%2T
Instantly I notice all the changes:
Mad Scientist Ziggs was bought then refunded on the same day without it ever being used (I was on my account on the 15th)
Rek'sai was gotten from crafting (didn't cost a thing, not refundable, my 3 only champion shards gone)
Project Katarina was refunded (the only money I spent on league)
I have 1 refund instead of 3
So then I wondered why I only had 50 rp...
I look at my gifting history...
http://imgur.com/a/FKCbH
I have never ever gifted someone ever before...
Now my account has gifted 2 skins to a person not even on my friends list on the 14th...
So pretty much in short form, my account got broken into and got robbed.
I changed my password on the 15th, but the damage was done.
After changing my password, my account went undisturbed. So I guess you could say my account got logged into.

So Riot...
All I'm asking for is to have my project Katarina skin back...
Thank you for reading...

(I'm sorry I love using ...)

Our specialists will be with you as soon as they can.
